description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(580).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,578,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (24 + 289*x + 24*x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 578*x^2 + x^4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 16 2013a(n) = 578*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 16 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[580], 30]] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[(24 + 289 x + 24 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 578 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 16 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[24,289,13896,167041]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 578*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 16 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
